p: When we have no other means of defending ourselves against the new virus, all we can really do is retreat indoors and prevent the virus from “jumping” from infected to healthy individuals too quickly. People generally do not have an intuitive sense of exponential growth. If each newly infected person infects just one more person each day, the number of newly infected people will increase from 2 to 16 during the early phase, which does not seem like a big increase.
